title: Wall Street Giants Poised to Offer Spot Bitcoin and Ethereum Trading
summary: US regulators greenlight Wall Street giants to host Bitcoin and Ethereum trading.

body.raw:
![Wall Street Giants Poised to Offer Spot Bitcoin and Ethereum Trading](https://beincrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/bic_crypto_market_general_5-covers.jpg)

US regulators greenlight Wall Street giants to host Bitcoin and Ethereum trading.

---

**Original Article:** [BeInCrypto](https://beincrypto.com/wall-street-giants-spot-bitcoin-ethereum-trading/)

*This article was originally published on [BeInCrypto](https://beincrypto.com/wall-street-giants-spot-bitcoin-ethereum-trading/) and has been curated for our readers.*
